OOC: Zerg rush haha! Love the StarCraft reference.
   
  ::Grimlock::
   
  Grimlock: Actually we there almost. Prepare for landing.
   
  Just as Grimlock is setting the controls to land the stolen Atlantis shuttle right back at the landing port he stole it from he gets the message asking for a status report for Jotunn. Grimlock opens a return commlink.
   
  Grimlock: Me Grimlock here. Have Motherload and Airtankers with me. Landing soon. Jotunn be ready.
   
  Grimlock closes the link and realizes that he hasn't radioed  ahead to tell Atlantis Air Traffic control who he is. Plus he is coming in way too fast.
   
  "Oh well," he thinks.
   
  A moment later the shuttle has just short of crashed into emrgency landing pads at the shuttle port.
   
  Grimlock: Any landing you can walk away from. Everybody walking?

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:
          Lock-on sighed.

Lock-on: Just great. The Minions pull a Zerg rush on us and manage
what they couldn't do since the last 100 teracycles. Well, there's no
wonder Jotunn wants Stormblaze!

Skysword: Hey Grimy! Are we there yet? What about now? Are we there
yet? Are we there yet? Are we there yet? Huh?

Motherload: Shut. Up. Skysword. LAST warning.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Grimlock::
> 
> Grimlock pilots the shuttle into the air and heads for Atlantis.
He decided he liked the behavior and personality of these bots.
> 
> Grimlock: Minions hit city with missiles. Lots of em too. Sweep's
were everywhere. Maximals were out numbered and out gunned fast. City
tore apart bad. Cyclonus and Scourge, leaders, went for Rodimus Prime.
Rodimus fought Cyclonus alone on near island. He lose. Cyclonus make
somekind of light beam. Take Matrix from Rodimus. Rodimus seem real
hurt. Minions all leave then.
> 
> Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:
> The Airtankers follow him and get inside the shuttle.
Being fliers
> themselves, this obviously bothered them.
> 
> Skysword: Screw that shuttle! This is too weird! I'll fly escort
outside.
> 
> Motherload: You will not do that. The situation clearly seems to call
> for all of us intact, so you chew your pretty little comfort or I'll
> shove it down your guzzler.
> 
> Being so rebuked, Skysword went in a corner to sulk. The three other
> Airtankers were not pleased with the decision, but watching Motherload
> being as irritable as Skysword about being stuck inside seemed to
> convince them.
> 
> Lock-on: Grimlock, what did the Minions do during the fight?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
> >
> > ::Grimlock::
> > 
> > Grimlock: Ok. Me Grimlock take you all to Jotunn. He still at
> Atlantis. Come on shuttle or fly if can.
> > 
> > Grimlock stomps back into the shuttle and transforms to robot
> mode. He starts up the shuttle and is preparing for lift off.
> > 
> > Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:
> > The airtankers all looked at Grimlock with a slack-jawed
> air and the
> > sense of impending doom they had dreaded. Add to that a touch of
> > pessimistic down mood, and that was as accurate a description of their
> > sparks as could be.
> > 
> > Lock-on: Holy sh...
> > 
> > Motherload: Shut up. THAT wasn't anything I'd expected... Gunrain, is
> > this accurate with the activity we've been reported?
> > 
> > Gunrain: Dam' right 'twas... Ow... That ain't gonna do us no good,
> Load...
> > 
> > Motherload: It won't, but if we keep things like that, we're just
> > giving Unicron the keys to get in here and screw everything up.
> > Grimlock, take us to Jotunn.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> ---------------------------------
> Never miss a thing. Make Yahoo your homepage.
>
